root.name: Kinect Sesame Street TV
root.description: OverviewKinect Sesame Street TV is an interactive television series developed and published by Microsoft for the Xbox 360 on September 18, 2012. Part of the Kinect TV series (released alongside Kinect Nat Geo TV), players watch special episodes of the children's television series Sesame Street while interacting in various activites with the Kinect.The game is distributed in two forms: as a retail disc (originally retailed for $29.99, which includes all eight episodes and codes for the downloadable version) and as a downloadable app (in which each episode can be purchased separately for 400 msp ($5) each). Both versions come with their own sets of achievements.This is the second Kinect-oriented Sesame Street game to be released, the first being Sesame Street: Once Upon a Monster.
